AD_DeadGithyankiBodyWithMap.synopsis: Laezel directs the player's attention to the dead body.
AD_DeadGithyankiBodyWithMap.how_to_trigger: Get near the dead githyanki body S_ORI_Laezel_DeadGithyankiWithMap_b6172751-f0fa-4c7b-aa71-45956fa2f918 with Laezel in the party and without having discovered the Creche yet.

AD_DeadGithyankiBodyWithMap_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_DeadGithyankiBodyWithMap_0.text: A dead githyanki. The corpse may hold something useful.
